results.title: Africa mosaic
results.brief_description: Depicts South Africa as a complex and multi-racial country with a vast diversity of ethnic groups, each with its own language, religion and cultural heritage. Previewing prior to class screening is recommended.

results.title: Afghanistan: the land of crags and deserts
results.brief_description: This film, without narration, includes various aspects of life in Afghanistan. Shows mosques, markets, women in chaderi, camel caravan watering sheep in a desert area, the game of buzkashi a form of polo which uses a headless goat, and examples of weaving and dancing.

results.title: Aerodynamics: Forces acting on an air foil
results.brief_description: Explains the theory and principles of forces acting on air foils. Tells of the development and use of wind tunnels to measure forces on wing form.

results.title: Aerobic exercising
results.brief_description: Aerobic exercising is shown as a means to enhance lifestyle and increase lifespan. Emphasizes the need for sensible preparation for any fitness program including aerobics, as well as giving attention to safety aspects.

results.title: Aerial fencing
results.brief_description: With the opening up of new pastures in New Zealand many hundreds of miles of new fencing were required; aircraft which have been previously employed in distributing fertilizers, were used to drop fencing posts and wire. The materials were carried in racks under the wings of the planes and deposited in the areas required.

results.title: Aerial farming services in New Zealand
results.creator_credit: Alert Films and Soil Conservation and Rivers Control Council
results.brief_description: The use of aeroplanes in schemes for restoring eroded lands to former fertility by dropping fertilizers to improve pasture and poison to combat the rabbit menace. Shows Tiger Moth aircraft being fitted to spray chemical compounds; mechanical loading of fertilizer into planes; aircraft in flight and spraying from the air. Points out the saving in time and money that results from the use of aircraft.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alert Films and Soil Conservation and Rivers Control Council
results.description: The use of aeroplanes in schemes for restoring eroded lands to former fertility by dropping fertilizers to improve pasture and poison to combat the rabbit menace. results.title: Advertising: a mixed blessing
results.brief_description: Examines why advertisers use certain images; how agencies select their target consumer groups; jobs created within the advertising industry; the way in which images are purveyed on billboards, T-shirts, trucks, trains; prestige advertising.

results.title: Adventuring in conservation
results.creator_credit: American Camping Association and Indiana University
results.brief_description: Shows boys and girls as they discover the interdependence of plants and animals in nature’s communities. How man destroys or upsets these communities; the importance of natural resources and what we can do to conserve them; camping practices which will help conserve natural resources.

results.title: Adventures in perception
results.creator_credit: Han Van Gelder and Han Van Gelder Filmproducktie N V
results.brief_description: Depicts the art works of Dutch artist Murits Escher, who creates illusions of shape by the use in his painting, drawing, sculpture etc. of such devices of mirror imagery, repetition, metamorphosis and geometric design.
